subject: Meet the Future: iPhone 15 Pro is Here!
preview: Experience the future of technology with the iPhone 15 Pro. Get a sneak peek now!
prompt: Generate a catchy introduction email for the iPhone 15 Pro to encourage window shoppers to make a purchase
emailContent: Dear Tech Enthusiast, get ready to step into the future with our brand new iPhone 15 Pro. Packed with cutting-edge features, this is not just a phone, it's a revolution. Don't wait, grab yours now!
imagePrompt: Generate an image of a sleek iPhone 15 Pro against a futuristic background

subject: Still Considering the iPhone 15 Pro? We Saved It For You!
preview: Your future iPhone 15 Pro is waiting in your cart. Don't let it slip away!
prompt: Generate a follow-up email for customers who abandoned their cart with the iPhone 15 Pro, encouraging them to complete their purchase
emailContent: Hi there, we noticed you left an iPhone 15 Pro in your cart. Don't let the future wait, complete your purchase now. Remember, the future is now!
imagePrompt: Generate an image of a shopping cart with an iPhone 15 Pro peeking out

subject: Exclusive: Special Offer on Your New iPhone 15 Pro
preview: As our valued customer, we have an exclusive offer just for you on the iPhone 15 Pro!
prompt: Generate an email offering a special discount on the iPhone 15 Pro for high converting customers
emailContent: Dear Valued Customer, as a token of appreciation for your loyalty, we are offering an exclusive discount on the iPhone 15 Pro. Grab this offer now and step into the future with us!
imagePrompt: Generate an image of the iPhone 15 Pro with a special discount badge
